Enchantment 3

Claymen
Ritual
W1E1
spell id [id]: 890
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 817
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 505
gems required [gemcost]: 5W
Summon Units:#817 Clayman x 5+[1/2 lvl]
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster forms several clay figures and gives them enchanted life. The Claymen are stronger than humans, never rout and regenerate damage. The Claymen are given hammers to fight with. Powerful mages can create more Claymen with each casting of the spell.
